trans-unit.source: The shader now uses three matrices.
trans-unit.target: 该着色器现在使用了三个矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The shader program also needs to be updated to use the textures instead of solid colors.
trans-unit.target: 着色器程序也需要更新,使用纹理而不是纯色。

trans-unit.source: The shader set is passed into the function buildShaderProgram(), which returns the compiled and linked shader program. We'll look at how this works next.
trans-unit.target: 着色器集传递到函数 buildShaderProgram() 中，该函数返回已编译并链接的着色器程序。接下来，我们将看看它是如何工作的。

trans-unit.source: The shader's source code is sent to the shader by calling gl.shaderSource().
trans-unit.target: 通过调用 gl.shaderSource() 将着色器的源代码发送到着色器。

trans-unit.source: The shaders
trans-unit.target: 着色器

trans-unit.source: The shaders are the bits of code written in GLSL that take our data points and ultimately render them to the screen. For convenience these shaders are stored in a <script> element that is brought into the program through the custom function MDN.createWebGLProgramFromIds(). This function is part of a collection of utility functions written for these tutorials and is not explained in depth here. This function handles the basics of taking some GLSL source code and compiling it into a WebGL program. The function takes three parameters — the context to render the program in, the ID of the <script> element containing the vertex shader, and the ID of the <script> element containing the fragment shader. The vertex shader positions the vertices, and the fragment shader colours each pixel.
trans-unit.target: 着色器是用GLSL编写的代码片段，它们吸收我们的数据点并最终将其渲染到屏幕上。为了方便起见，这些着色器存储在 <script> 元素中，该元素通过自定义函数 MDN.createWebGLProgramFromIds() 引入程序中。该功能是为这些教程编写的实用程序功能的集合的一部分，此处不再赘述。此函数处理获取一些GLSL源代码并将其编译为WebGL程序的基础知识。该函数具有三个参数-用于渲染程序的上下文，包含顶点着色器的 <script> 元素的ID和 <script> 的ID包含片段着色器的元素。顶点着色器放置顶点，片段着色器为每个像素着色。

trans-unit.source: The shape of the wave produced by the node. Valid values are 'sine', 'square', 'sawtooth', 'triangle' and 'custom'. The default is 'sine'.
trans-unit.target: 节点产生的波的形状。有效值为“ sine ”，“ square ”，“ sawtooth ”，“ triangle ”和“ custom ”。默认值为“ sine ”。

trans-unit.source: The shipping options the user may choose from. If this sequence is blank, it indicates the merchant cannot ship to the current shipping address. The default shipping option may be indicated in this sequence.

trans-unit.source: The short example above, like nearly all of the examples in this reference, is JavaScript. That is to say, it's written in JavaScript, but it uses the DOM to access the document and its elements. The DOM is not a programming language, but without it, the JavaScript language wouldn't have any model or notion of web pages, HTML documents, XML documents, and their component parts (e.g. elements). Every element in a document—the document as a whole, the head, tables within the document, table headers, text within the table cells—is part of the document object model for that document, so they can all be accessed and manipulated using the DOM and a scripting language like JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: 与本参考中的几乎所有示例一样，上面的简短示例是JavaScript。也就是说，它是用 JavaScript编写的，但是它使用 DOM来访问文档及其元素。 DOM不是一种编程语言，但是如果没有它，JavaScript语言将不会具有网页，HTML文档，XML文档及其组成部分（例如元素）的任何模型或概念。文档中的每个元素-整个文档，标题，文档中的表格，表格标题，表格单元格中的文本-都是该文档的文档对象模型的一部分，因此可以使用DOM和JavaScript之类的脚本语言。

trans-unit.source: The site storage system described by the Storage Standard and interacted with using the Storage API consists of a single site storage unit for each origin. In essence, every Web site or Web application has its own storage unit into which its data gets placed. The diagram below shows a site storage pool with three storage units within, showing how storage units can have different data types stored within and may have different quotas (maximum storage limits).
trans-unit.target: 存储标准所描述的站点存储系统以及使用存储API进行交互的站点存储系统由针对每个来源的单个站点存储单元组成。本质上，每个网站或Web应用程序都有其自己的存储单元，数据可以放入该存储单元中。下图显示了一个站点存储池，其中包含三个存储单元，显示了存储单元如何在其中存储不同的数据类型以及如何具有不同的配额（最大存储限制）。

trans-unit.target: 该站点的 <body> 在此处配置为使用多种常见的sans-serif字体之一，并使用 "aliceblue" 作为背景色。然后定义 "wrapper" 类；它包装了整个博客，包括标题，侧栏和正文内容（文章和广告）。

trans-unit.source: The size (in octets) received from the fetch (HTTP or cache) of the message body, after removing any applied content-codings.
trans-unit.target: 移除任何应用的内容编码后,从获取(HTTP或缓存)的消息体中收到的大小(以八位数为单位)。

trans-unit.source: The size and type of the recorded media are output to the log area below the two videos and the download button.
trans-unit.target: 录制媒体的大小和类型会输出到两个视频和下载按钮下方的日志区域。

trans-unit.source: The size of an application's resources can affect an application's performance so getting accurate data on resource size can be important (especially for non-hosted resources). The PerformanceResourceTiming interface has three properties that can be used to obtain size data about a resource. The transferSize property returns the size (in octets) of the fetched resource including the response header fields plus the response payload body. The encodedBodySize property returns the size (in octets) received from the fetch (HTTP or cache), of the payload body, before removing any applied content-codings. decodedBodySize returns the size (in octets) received from the fetch (HTTP or cache) of the message body, after removing any applied content-codings.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序资源的大小会影响应用程序的性能，因此获取有关资源大小的准确数据非常重要（尤其是对于非托管资源）。所述 PerformanceResourceTiming 接口具有可用于获得关于资源的大小的数据的三个属性。所述 transferSize 属性返回所获取的资源，包括响应报头字段加上响应的负载体的大小（以字节为单位）。所述 encodedBodySize 从取（HTTP或高速缓存）接收属性返回的大小（以字节为单位），则的有效载荷体，前去除任何施加的内容编码。 decodedBodySize 从抓取（HTTP或高速缓存）的接收到的返回的大小（以字节）消息主体，之后除去任何施加的内容编码。

trans-unit.source: The size of the file in bytes as a read-only 64-bit integer.
trans-unit.target: 文件的大小,以字节为单位,是一个只读的64位整数。

trans-unit.source: The size of the first canvas is set to the styled Element size, determined by CSS. This is done by assigning the width and height properties of the canvas to the values of the clientWidth and clientHeight properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 第一个画布的大小设置为样式化的 Element 大小，由CSS确定。这是通过将画布的 width 和 height 属性分别分配给 clientWidth 和 clientHeight 属性的值来完成的。

trans-unit.source: The size of the input and output buffer are defined at the creation time, when the AudioContext.createScriptProcessor() method is called (both are defined by AudioContext.createScriptProcessor()'s bufferSize parameter). The buffer size must be a power of 2 between 256 and 16384, that is 256, 512, 1024, 2048, 4096, 8192 or 16384. Small numbers lower the latency, but large number may be necessary to avoid audio breakup and glitches.
trans-unit.target: 当调用 AudioContext.createScriptProcessor() 方法时，输入和输出缓冲区的大小在创建时定义（均由 AudioContext.createScriptProcessor() 的 bufferSize 参数定义）。缓冲区的大小必须是2之间的功率 256 和 16384 ，即 256 ， 512 ， 1024 ， 2048 ， 4096 ， 8192 或 16384 。较小的数字可降低延迟，但为避免音频中断和毛刺，可能需要较大的数字。

trans-unit.source: The size property is now an unsigned long. The type property must be entirely given in lowercase characters.
trans-unit.target: size 属性现在是一个无符号的 long。类型属性必须全部用小写字符给出。

trans-unit.source: The size, in bytes, of the data contained in the Blob object.
trans-unit.target: Blob 对象中包含的数据的大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The spec description of abort() is somewhat confusing — consider for example step 1 of reset parser state. The MSE API is fully asynchronous, but this step seems to suggest a synchronous (blocking) operation, which doesn't make sense.
trans-unit.target: abort() 的规范描述有些令人困惑-例如，考虑reset解析器状态的步骤1 。MSE API是完全异步的，但是此步骤似乎建议执行同步（阻止）操作，这没有任何意义。

trans-unit.source: The spec description of abort() is somewhat confusing — consider for example step 1 of reset parser state. The MSE API is fully asynchronous, but this step seems to suggest a synchronous (blocking) operation, which doesn't make sense.
The spec requires that the passed supportedConfigurations option contain at least one of audioCapabilities or videoCapabilities, and that said parameters include a codec string.
trans-unit.target: 规范要求所传递的 supportedConfigurations 选项至少包含 audioCapabilities 或 videoCapabilities 之一，并且所述参数包括编解码器字符串。

trans-unit.target: 可以在属性值旁边指定特殊键 offset ， easing 和 composite （如下所述）。

trans-unit.source: The specification asks browsers to provide as little information via this field as possible. Never assume that the value of this property will stay the same in future versions of the same browser. Try not to use it at all, or only for current and past versions of a browser. New browsers may start using the same UA, or part of it, as an older browser: you really have no guarantee that the browser agent is indeed the one advertised by this property.
trans-unit.target: 该规范要求浏览器通过该字段提供尽可能少的信息。千万不要假设此属性的值在同一浏览器的未来版本中会保持不变。尽量不要使用它,或者只对当前和过去版本的浏览器使用。新的浏览器可能会开始使用与旧的浏览器相同的 UA 或其中的一部分:您确实无法保证浏览器代理确实是该属性所宣传的那个。

trans-unit.source: The specification doesn't go into a lot of detail about things like how many audio contexts a user agent should support, or minimum or maximum latency requirements (if any), so these details can vary from browser to browser. Be sure to check the values if they matter to you.
trans-unit.target: 该规范并没有对用户代理应该支持多少个音频上下文,或最小或最大延迟要求(如果有的话)等细节进行详细说明,因此这些细节可能会因浏览器而异。如果这些值对你很重要,请务必检查。

trans-unit.source: The specification explicitly allows the future definition of new speaker layouts. This fallback is therefore not future proof as the behavior of the browsers for a specific number of channels may change in the future.
trans-unit.target: 该规范明确允许未来定义新的扬声器布局。因此,这种后备功能并不是面向未来的,因为浏览器对特定数量通道的行为可能在未来发生变化。

trans-unit.source: The specified data is too large for the other peer to receive. Since there are multiple techniques for breaking up large data into smaller pieces for transfer, it's possible to encounter scenarios in which the other peer does not support the same ones. For example, if one peer is a modern browser that supports using the EOR (End of Record) flag to indicate when a received message is the last piece of a multi-part object sent using send(). For more information about message size restrictions, see Understanding message size limits in Using WebRTC data channels.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 data 太大，其他对等方无法接收。由于有多种技术可以将大数据分解为较小的数据块以进行传输，因此有可能会遇到其他对等方不支持相同数据的情况。例如，如果一个同位体是支持使用 EOR （记录结束）标志的现代浏览器，以指示何时接收到的消息是使用 send() 发送的多部分对象的最后一条。有关消息大小限制的详细信息，请参阅了解邮件大小限制在使用的WebRTC数据信道。

trans-unit.source: The state object can be anything that can be serialized. Because Firefox saves state objects to the user's disk so they can be restored after the user restarts the browser, we impose a size limit of 640k characters on the serialized representation of a state object. If you pass a state object whose serialized representation is larger than this to pushState(), the method will throw an exception. If you need more space than this, you're encouraged to use sessionStorage and/or localStorage.
trans-unit.target: 状态对象可以是任何可以序列化的对象。因为Firefox将状态对象保存到用户的磁盘上，以便用户重新启动浏览器后可以将其还原，所以我们对状态对象的序列化表示施加了640k个字符的大小限制。如果将序列化表示形式大于此形式的状态对象传递给 pushState() ，则该方法将引发异常。如果您需要更多空间，建议您使用 sessionStorage 和/或 localStorage 。

trans-unit.source: The structured clone algorithm is an algorithm defined by the HTML5 specification for copying complex JavaScript objects. It is used internally when transferring data to and from Workers via postMessage() or when storing objects with IndexedDB. It builds up a clone by recursing through the input object while maintaining a map of previously visited references in order to avoid infinitely traversing cycles.
trans-unit.target: 结构化克隆算法是HTML5规范定义的用于复制复杂JavaScript对象的算法。当通过 postMessage() 与Workers之间来回传输数据时，或者在使用IndexedDB存储对象时，在内部使用它。它通过递归遍历输入对象而建立一个副本，同时保持先前访问的引用的映射，以避免无限遍历循环。

trans-unit.source: The structured clone algorithm is an algorithm defined by the HTML5 specification for copying complex JavaScript objects. It is used internally when transferring data to and from Workers via postMessage() or when storing objects with IndexedDB. It builds up a clone by recursing through the input object while maintaining a map of previously visited references in order to avoid infinitely traversing cycles.

trans-unit.source: The sum of the Quantization Parameter (QP) values associated with every frame received to date on the video track described by this RTCRtpStreamStats object. In general, the higher this number is, the more heavily compressed the video track was. Combined with RTCReceivedRtpStreamStats.framesDecoded or RTCSentRtpStreamStats.framesEncoded, you can approximate the average QP over those frames, keeping in mind that codecs often vary the quantizer values even within frames. Also keep in mind that the values of QP can vary from codec to codec, so this value is only potentially useful when compared against the same codec.
trans-unit.target: 与此 RTCRtpStreamStats 对象描述的视频轨道上迄今为止接收到的每个帧关联的量化参数（QP）值的总和。通常，此数字越高，视频轨道的压缩程度就越高。与 RTCReceivedRtpStreamStats.framesDecoded 或 RTCSentRtpStreamStats.framesEncoded 结合使用时，您可以估算出这些帧的平均QP，请记住，编解码器即使在帧内也经常改变量化值。还请记住，QP的值可能会因编解码器而异，因此仅当与同一编解码器比较时，此值才可能有用。

trans-unit.source: The terms used to describe trees show up often in the DOM Level 1 Core. Each of the boxes I drew in the tree above is a node in the tree. The line above a node expresses a parent-child relationship: the node on top is the parent, and the node on the bottom is the child. Two children of the same parent are therefore siblings. Similarly, one can refer to ancestors and descendants. (Cousins are too messy, though.)
trans-unit.target: 用于描述树的术语在DOM一级核心中经常出现。我在上面的树中画的每一个方框都是树中的一个节点。节点上面的线表达的是父子关系:上面的节点是父节点,下面的节点是子节点。因此,同一个父节点的两个子节点是兄弟姐妹。同样,也可以指祖先和后代。不过堂兄弟姐妹太乱了)。

trans-unit.source: The text track is currently active but the cues aren't being displayed. If the user agent hasn't tried to obtain the track's cues yet, it will do so soon (thereby populating the track's TextTrack.cues property). The user agent is keeping a list of the active cues (in the track's activeCues property) and events are being fired at the corresponding times, even though the text isn't being displayed.
trans-unit.target: 文本轨道当前处于活动状态，但未显示提示。如果用户代理尚未尝试获取轨道的线索，它将很快完成（从而填充轨道的 TextTrack.cues 属性）。用户代理会保留活动提示的列表（在轨道的 activeCues 属性中），并且即使没有显示文本，也会在相应的时间触发事件。

trans-unit.source: The text track is currently disabled. While the track's presence is exposed in the DOM, the user agent is otherwise ignoring it. No cues are active, no events are being fired, and the user agent won't attempt to obtain the track's cues.
trans-unit.target: 文本跟踪目前被禁用。当DOM中显示出该轨迹的存在时,用户代理却忽略了它。没有任何提示被激活,没有任何事件被触发,用户代理也不会试图获取该轨迹的提示。

trans-unit.source: The text track is currently enabled and is visible. If the track's cues list hasn't been obtained yet, it will be soon. The activeCues list is being maintained and events are firing at the appropriate times; the track's text is also being drawn appropriately based on the styling and the track's kind.
trans-unit.target: 文本轨道当前已启用并且可见。如果尚未获得曲目的提示列表，那将很快。该 activeCues 列表正在维护和事件在适当的时候发射; 还会根据样式和轨道的 kind 适当地绘制轨道的文本。

trans-unit.source: The third and last variant of the drawImage() method has eight parameters in addition to the image source. It lets us cut out a section of the source image, then scale and draw it on our canvas.
trans-unit.target: drawImage() 方法的第三个也是最后一个变体，除了图像源之外，还具有八个参数。它使我们可以剪切源图像的一部分，然后缩放并将其绘制在画布上。

trans-unit.source: The third argument is used when creating images using lossy compression (namely, image/jpeg) to specify the quality of the output.
trans-unit.target: 当使用有损压缩（即 image/jpeg ）创建图像以指定输出质量时，使用第三个参数。

trans-unit.source: The third field, "udp", is the protocol type, indicating that the candidate would use the UDP transport protocol.
trans-unit.target: 第三个字段 "udp" 是协议类型，指示候选者将使用UDP传输协议。

trans-unit.source: The third line here is a bit complex-looking, so let's explain it step by step. The SpeechRecognitionEvent.results property returns a SpeechRecognitionResultList object containing SpeechRecognitionResult objects. It has a getter so it can be accessed like an array — so the [last] returns the SpeechRecognitionResult at the last position. Each SpeechRecognitionResult object contains SpeechRecognitionAlternative objects that contain individual recognised words. These also have getters so they can be accessed like arrays — the [0] therefore returns the SpeechRecognitionAlternative at position 0. We then return its transcript property to get a string containing the individual recognised result as a string, set the background color to that color, and report the color recognised as a diagnostic message in the UI.
trans-unit.target: 第三行看起来有点复杂，所以让我们逐步解释它。所述 SpeechRecognitionEvent.results 属性返回一个 SpeechRecognitionResultList 含有对象 SpeechRecognitionResult 对象。它具有一个吸气剂，因此可以像数组一样进行访问—因此 [last] 在最后一个位置返回 SpeechRecognitionResult 。每个 SpeechRecognitionResult 对象都包含 SpeechRecognitionAlternative 对象，这些对象包含单个识别的单词。这些也具有吸气剂，因此可以像数组一样对其进行访问-因此 [0] 返回 SpeechRecognitionAlternative 在位置0。然后返回其transcript属性，以获取包含单个识别结果的字符串作为字符串，将背景色设置为该颜色，并在UI中报告识别为诊断消息的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The third, and an optional step, is to call closePath(). This method tries to close the shape by drawing a straight line from the current point to the start. If the shape has already been closed or there's only one point in the list, this function does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 第三步（也是可选步骤）是调用 closePath() 。此方法尝试通过绘制从当前点到起点的直线来闭合形状。如果形状已经关闭或列表中只有一个点，则此功能不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.target: 这三个 GainNode 实例分别为三个振荡器提供音量级别。 gainNode2 和 gainNode3 将使用 ConstantSourceNode 链接在一起以具有相同的可调值。

trans-unit.source: The three modes of transactions are: readwrite, readonly, and versionchange. The only way to create and delete object stores and indexes is by using a versionchange transaction. To learn more about transaction types, see the reference article for IndexedDB.
trans-unit.target: 事务的三种模式是： readwrite ， readonly 和 versionchange 。创建和删除对象存储和索引的唯一方法是使用版本 versionchange 事务。要了解有关事务类型的更多信息，请参见IndexedDB的参考文章。

trans-unit.source: The three parameters x, y and z are unitless and describe a direction vector in 3D space using the right-hand Cartesian coordinate system. The default value of the direction vector is (1,0,0).
trans-unit.target: 三个参数 x ， y 和 z 是无单位的，并使用右手笛卡尔坐标系描述3D空间中的方向矢量。方向矢量的默认值是 (1, 0, 0) 。

trans-unit.source: The three parameters x, y and z are unitless and describe the listener's position in 3D space according to the right-hand Cartesian coordinate system. PannerNode objects use this position relative to individual audio sources for spatialisation.
trans-unit.target: 三个参数 x ， y 和 z 是无单位的，它们根据右手笛卡尔坐标系描述了听众在3D空间中的位置。 PannerNode 对象使用相对于各个音频源的此位置进行空间化。

trans-unit.source: The three versions of this method (uniformMatrix2fv(), uniformMatrix3fv(), and unifomMatrix4fv()) take as the input value 2-component, 3-component, and 4-component vectors, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的三个版本（ uniformMatrix2fv() ， uniformMatrix3fv() 和 unifomMatrix4fv() ）分别将2-分量，3-分量和4-分量向量作为输入值。

trans-unit.source: The time after which the keys in the current session can no longer be used to decrypt media data, or NaN if no such time exists. This value is determined by the CDM and measured in milliseconds since January 1, 1970, UTC. This value may change during a session lifetime, such as when an action triggers the start of a window.
trans-unit.target: 当前会话中的密钥之后的时间将不能再用于解密媒体数据，如果没有这样的时间，则不能再使用 NaN 。此值由CDM确定，自1970年1月1日（UTC）以来以毫秒为单位测量。此值可能会在会话生存期内更改，例如当操作触发窗口开始时。

trans-unit.source: The time allowed to acquire the geolocation, defined by PositionOptions.timeout information that was reached before the information was obtained.
trans-unit.target: 获取地理位置所允许的时间，该时间由 PositionOptions.timeout 信息定义，在获取信息之前已经达到该时间。

trans-unit.source: The time allowed to acquire the geolocation, defined by PositionOptions.timeout information was reached before the information was obtained.
trans-unit.target: 在获取信息之前，已经达到了由 PositionOptions.timeout 信息定义的获取地理位置的时间。

trans-unit.source: The time at which the event was created (in milliseconds). By specification, this value is time since epoch, but in reality browsers' definitions vary; in addition, work is underway to change this to be a DOMHighResTimeStamp instead.
trans-unit.target: 创建事件的时间（以毫秒为单位）。根据规范，此值是自时代以来的时间，但实际上浏览器的定义有所不同；此外，正在进行将其更改为 DOMHighResTimeStamp 的工作。

trans-unit.source: The time in milliseconds since epoch at which the current animation cycle began. Use Animation.startTime instead.
trans-unit.target: 从当前动画周期开始的纪元开始的时间（以毫秒为单位）。请改用 Animation.startTime 。

trans-unit.source: The time in milliseconds, relative to the time at which the document was created, at which the ad's visibility count was last updated, or the ad last became visible. 0 if the ad was not visible as of the last time it was checked.
trans-unit.target: 以毫秒为单位的时间,相对于文档创建的时间,广告的可见性计数最后更新的时间,或者广告最后可见的时间。如果广告在最后一次被检查时不可见,则为0。

trans-unit.source: The time is given in milliseconds elapsed since the UNIX epoch (the first moment of January 1, 1970, UTC).
trans-unit.target: 时间以UNIX纪元(1970年1月1日的第一个时刻,UTC)以来的毫秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: The time lapse (in number of milliseconds) between each invocation (read/write).

trans-unit.source: The time values for this timeline are calculated as a fixed offset from the global clock such that the zero time corresponds to the navigationStart moment plus a signed delta known as the origin time. Prior to establishing the navigationStart moment, the document timeline is inactive.
trans-unit.target: 计算此时间线的时间值是相对于全局时钟的固定偏移量，以使零时间对应于 navigationStart 力矩加上一个有符号的增量，称为原点时间。在建立 navigationStart 时刻之前，文档时间轴处于非活动状态。

trans-unit.source: The time, in milliseconds (thousandths of a second), the timer should delay in between executions of the specified function or code. If this parameter is less than 10, a value of 10 is used. Note that the actual delay may be longer; see Reasons for delays longer than specified in WindowOrWorkerGlobalScope.setTimeout() for examples.
trans-unit.target: 计时器应以毫秒（千分之一秒）为单位在指定功能或代码的执行之间延迟。如果此参数小于10，则使用值10。请注意，实际延迟可能会更长；看到超过规定的延迟较长的原因在WindowOrWorkerGlobalScope.setTimeout（）的例子。

trans-unit.source: The time, in milliseconds (thousandths of a second), the timer should wait before the specified function or code is executed. If this parameter is omitted, a value of 0 is used, meaning execute "immediately", or more accurately, as soon as possible. Note that in either case, the actual delay may be longer than intended; see Reasons for delays longer than specified below.
trans-unit.target: 时间（以毫秒（千分之一秒）为单位），计时器应等待执行指定的功能或代码。如果省略此参数，则使用值0，表示“立即”或更准确地执行。请注意，无论哪种情况，实际延迟都可能比预期的要长。请参阅延迟时间长于下文指定的原因。

trans-unit.source: The time, in seconds, at which the sound should begin to play, in the same time coordinate system used by the AudioContext. If when is less than (AudioContext.currentTime, or if it's 0, the sound begins to play at once. The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 音频应开始播放的时间（以秒为单位），与 AudioContext 使用的时间坐标系相同。如果 when 小于（ AudioContext.currentTime ，或者为0，则声音立即开始播放。默认值为0。

trans-unit.source: The time, in seconds, at which the sound should begin to play. trans-unit.target: 声音应开始播放的时间（以秒为单位）。在与 AudioContext 的 currentTime 属性相同的时间坐标系中指定此值。值为0（或完全省略 when 参数）会使声音立即开始播放。

trans-unit.source: The time, in seconds, at which the sound should stop playing. This value is specified in the same time coordinate system as the AudioContext is using for its currentTime attribute. Omitting this parameter, specifying a value of 0, or passing a negative value causes the sound to stop playback immediately.
trans-unit.target: 声音应停止播放的时间（以秒为单位）。在与 AudioContext 的 currentTime 属性相同的时间坐标系中指定此值。省略此参数，将值指定为0或传递负值会使声音立即停止播放。

trans-unit.source: The timestamp is not actually high-resolution. To mitigate security threats such as Spectre, browsers currently round the results to varying degrees. (Firefox started rounding to 1 millisecond in Firefox 60.) Some browsers may also slightly randomize the timestamp. The precision may improve again in future releases; browser developers are still investigating these timing attacks and how best to mitigate them.
trans-unit.target: 时间戳实际上不是高分辨率的。为了减轻诸如Spectre之类的安全威胁，浏览器目前对结果进行了不同程度的调整。（Firefox在Firefox 60中开始四舍五入为1毫秒。）某些浏览器可能还会稍微随机化时间戳。在将来的版本中，精度可能会再次提高；浏览器开发人员仍在调查这些计时攻击以及如何最好地缓解它们。

trans-unit.source: The timestamp must be greater that the cue's start timestamp, greater than any previous timestamp in the cue payload, and less than the cue's end timestamp. The active text is the text between the timestamp and the next timestamp or to the end of the payload if there is not another timestamp in the payload. Any text before the active text in the payload is previous text . Any text beyond the active text is future text . This enables karaoke style captions.
trans-unit.target: 时间戳必须大于提示的开始时间戳，大于提示有效载荷中的任何先前时间戳，并且小于提示的结束时间戳。所述激活文本是时间戳和下一时间戳之间或有效载荷的末尾文字如果没有在有效载荷的另一个时间戳。有效内容中活动文本之前的任何文本都是先前的文本。活动文本以外的任何文本都是将来的文本。这样可以启用卡拉OK字幕。

trans-unit.source: The timestamp starts at 0 the first time VRDisplay.getFrameData() is invoked for a given VRDisplay.
trans-unit.target: 时间戳始于0，是第一次为给定 VRDisplay 调用 VRDisplay.getFrameData() 时。

trans-unit.source: The touch event interfaces support application-specific single and multi-touch interactions. However, the interfaces can be a bit tricky for programmers to use because touch events are very different from other DOM input events, such as mouse events. The application described in this guide shows how to use touch events for simple single and multi-touch interactions, the basics needed to build application-specific gestures.
trans-unit.target: 触摸事件界面支持特定于应用程序的单触摸和多触摸交互。但是，由于触摸事件与其他DOM输入事件（例如， mouse events 非常不同，因此对于程序员而言，使用界面可能有些棘手。本指南中描述的应用程序展示了如何将触摸事件用于简单的单点和多点触摸交互，这是构建特定于应用程序的手势所需的基础。

trans-unit.source: The touch events interfaces are relatively low-level APIs that can be used to support application specific multi-touch interactions such as a two-finger gesture. A multi-touch interaction starts when a finger (or stylus) first touches the contact surface. Other fingers may subsequently touch the surface and optionally move across the touch surface. The interaction ends when the fingers are removed from the surface. During this interaction, an application receives touch events during the start, move and end phases.
trans-unit.target: 触摸事件接口是相对较低级的 API,可用于支持特定应用的多点触摸交互,如双指手势。当手指(或触控笔)首次接触接触表面时,多点触摸交互开始。其他手指可随后触摸该表面,并可选择在触摸表面上移动。当手指从表面移开时,交互结束。在此交互过程中,应用程序在开始、移动和结束阶段接收触摸事件。

trans-unit.source: The touch events interfaces support application specific single and multi-touch interactions such as a two-finger gesture. A multi-touch interaction starts when a finger (or stylus) first touches the contact surface. Other fingers may subsequently touch the surface and optionally move across the touch surface. The interaction ends when the fingers are removed from the surface. During this interaction, an application receives touch events during the start, move, and end phases. The application may apply its own semantics to the touch inputs.
trans-unit.target: 触摸事件接口支持特定应用的单点和多点触摸交互,如双指手势。当手指(或触控笔)首次接触接触面时,多点触摸交互开始。随后,其他手指可能会接触到接触面,并可选择在接触面上移动。当手指从表面移开时,交互结束。在此交互过程中,应用程序在开始、移动和结束阶段接收触摸事件。应用程序可以将自己的语义应用于触摸输入。

trans-unit.source: The touch events standard defines a few browser requirements regarding touch and mouse interaction (see the Interaction with Mouse Events and click section for details), noting the browser may fire both touch events and mouse events in response to the same user input. This section describes the requirement that may affect an application.
trans-unit.target: 触摸事件标准定义了一些有关触摸和鼠标交互的浏览器要求（有关详细信息，请参见与鼠标事件的交互和单击部分），并指出浏览器可能会响应同一用户输入而触发触摸事件和鼠标事件。本节描述了可能影响应用程序的要求。

trans-unit.source: The touch list(s) an application uses depends on the semantics of the application's gestures. For example, if an application supports a single touch (tap) on one element, it would use the targetTouches list in the touchstart event handler to process the touch point in an application-specific manner. If an application supports two-finger swipe for any two touch points, it will use the changedTouches list in the touchmove event handler to determine if two touch points had moved and then implement the semantics of that gesture in an application-specific manner.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序使用的触摸列表取决于应用程序手势的语义。例如，如果应用程序在一个元素上支持单个触摸（轻 touchstart ），它将使用touchstart事件处理程序中的 targetTouches 列表以特定于应用程序的方式处理触摸点。如果应用程序支持任何两个触摸点的两指滑动，它将使用 touchmove 事件处理程序中的 changedTouches 列表确定两个触摸点是否已移动，然后以特定于应用程序的方式实现该手势的语义。

trans-unit.source: The touch point (or points) that were removed from the surface can be found in the TouchList specified by the changedTouches attribute.
trans-unit.target: 从表面移除的一个或多个接触点可以在 changedTouches 属性指定的 TouchList 中找到。

trans-unit.source: The touch point has left the document window and moved into the browser's UI area, a plug-in, or other external content.
trans-unit.target: 触摸点已经离开文档窗口,移动到浏览器的UI区域、插件或其他外部内容中。

trans-unit.source: The touch-sensitive surface. This may be a screen or trackpad.

trans-unit.target: 曲目ID也可以作为加载特定曲目的URL的片段(如果媒体支持媒体片段)。

trans-unit.source: The track's getConstraints() method returns the set of constraints passed into the most recent call to applyConstraints(). This may not represent the actual current state of the track, due to properties whose requested values had to be adjusted and because platform default values aren't represented. For a complete representation of the track's current configuration, use getSettings().
trans-unit.target: 轨道的 getConstraints() 方法返回传递到对 applyConstraints() 的最新调用中的约束集。由于必须调整其请求值的属性以及未表示平台默认值，因此这可能无法表示轨道的实际当前状态。要完整了解轨道的当前配置，请使用 getSettings() 。

trans-unit.source: The track's resolution might be the result of the user agent using cropping or downscaling from a higher camera resolution.
trans-unit.target: 轨迹的分辨率可能是用户代理使用裁剪或从更高的相机分辨率下调的结果。

trans-unit.source: The tracks are searched in their natural order; that is, in the order defined by the media resource itself, or, if the resource doesn't define an order, the relative order in which the tracks are declared by the media resource.
trans-unit.target: 轨迹按自然顺序搜索,即按媒体资源本身定义的顺序搜索,如果资源没有定义顺序,则按媒体资源声明的轨迹的相对顺序搜索。

trans-unit.target: 过渡在运行到完成之前就停止了,例如通过将鼠标从悬停过渡元素上移开。

trans-unit.source: The transport has finished gathering ICE candidates and has sent the end-of-candidates indicator to the remote device. The transport won't gather any further candidates unless an ICE restart occurs, at which point the gathering process starts over from scratch.
trans-unit.target: 传输已完成ICE候选者的收集，并且已将候选者结束指示符发送到远程设备。除非重新启动ICE，否则传输不会收集任何其他候选对象，此时，收集过程将从头开始。

trans-unit.source: The transport has finished gathering ICE candidates and has sent the end-of-candidates indicator to the remote device. The transport won't gather any further candidates unless an ICE restart occurs, at which point the gathering process starts over from scratch.
trans-unit.target: 传输已完成ICE候选者的收集，并且已将候选者结束指示符发送到远程设备。除非重新启动ICE，否则传输不会收集任何其他候选对象，此时，收集过程将从头开始。

trans-unit.source: The transport has finished gathering local candidates and has received a notification from the remote peer that no more candidates will be sent. In addition, all candidate pairs have been considered and a pair has been selected for use. If consent checks fail on all successful candidate pairs, the transport state will change to "failed".
trans-unit.target: 传输已完成本地候选人的收集，并且已收到来自远程对等方的通知，不再发送任何候选人。另外，已经考虑了所有候选对，并选择了一对来使用。如果对所有成功的候选对的同意检查均失败，则传输状态将更改为 "failed" 。

trans-unit.source: The transport has shut down and is no longer responding to STUN requests.
trans-unit.target: 运输工具已关闭,不再响应STUN请求。

trans-unit.source: The transport is in the process of gathering candidates.
trans-unit.target: 运输正在征集考生。

trans-unit.source: The transport is the controlled agent.
trans-unit.target: 运输是受控的代理人。

trans-unit.source: The transport layer deals with any buffered messages; the protocol layer decides whether to send them or discard them.
trans-unit.target: 传输层处理任何缓冲的消息;协议层决定是否发送或丢弃这些消息。

trans-unit.source: The transport may revert from the "connected" state to the "checking" state if either peer decides to cancel consent to use the selected candidate pair, and may revert to "disconnected" if there are no candidates left to check but one or both clients are still gathering candidates.
trans-unit.target: 如果任一对等方决定取消同意使用所选候选对，则传输可以从 "connected" 状态恢复为 "checking" 状态，如果没有余下的候选对象可以进行检查，而只有一个或两个客户端，则传输可以转换为 "disconnected" 仍在收集候选人。

trans-unit.source: The transport over which Real-time Transport Control Protocol (RTCP) information is exchanged. This value is null before the RTCDtlsTransport object is created. When bundling is in use, more than one RTCRtpSender can share the same transport, sending all RTP and RTCP information over that one transport.
trans-unit.target: 在其上交换实时传输控制协议（RTCP）信息的传输。在创建 RTCDtlsTransport 对象之前，此值为 null 。使用捆绑时，多个 RTCRtpSender 可以共享同一传输，并通过该传输发送所有RTP和RTCP信息。

trans-unit.source: The transport will receive incoming connection attempts but won't attempt a connection itself.
trans-unit.target: 传输将接收传入的连接尝试,但不会自己尝试连接。

trans-unit.source: The transport will receive incoming connection requests but won't try to open an outbound connection.
trans-unit.target: 传输将接收传入的连接请求,但不会尝试打开一个出站连接。

trans-unit.source: The transport will try to open a connection simultaneously with its peer.
trans-unit.target: 传输将尝试与其对等体同时打开一个连接。

trans-unit.source: The transport will try to open an outbound connection but won't receive incoming connection requests. This is the most common type, and the only one that most user agents will gather.
trans-unit.target: 传输将尝试打开一个出站连接,但不会接收传入的连接请求。这是最常见的类型,也是大多数用户代理会收集的唯一类型。

trans-unit.source: The transport will try to open an outbound connection but won't receive inoming connection requests.
trans-unit.target: 传输将尝试打开一个出站连接,但不会收到入站连接请求。

The twin concepts of constraints and capabilities let the browser and Web site or app exchange information about what constrainable properties the browser's implementation supports and what values it supports for each one. This article discusses capabilities and constraints, as well as media settings, and includes an example we call the Constraint Exerciser.
trans-unit.target: 约束和功能的双重概念使浏览器和网站或应用程序可以交换有关浏览器实现支持哪些可约束属性以及每个浏览器支持哪些值的信息。本文讨论了功能和约束以及媒体设置，并提供了一个示例（称为Constraint Exerciser）。

trans-unit.source: The twin concepts of constraints and capabilities let the browser and Web site or app exchange information about what constrainable properties the browser's implementation supports and what values it supports for each one. This article discusses capabilities and constraints, as well as media settings, and includes an example we call the Constraint Exerciser. The Constraint Exerciser lets you experiment with the results of different constraint sets being applied to the audio and video tracks coming from the computer's A/V input devices (such as its webcam and microphone).
trans-unit.target: 约束和功能的双重概念使浏览器和网站或应用程序可以交换有关浏览器实现支持哪些可约束属性以及每个浏览器支持哪些值的信息。本文讨论了功能和约束以及媒体设置，并提供了一个示例（称为Constraint Exerciser）。使用“约束练习器”，您可以尝试将不同约束集的结果应用于来自计算机A / V输入设备（例如其网络摄像头和麦克风）的音频和视频轨道。

trans-unit.target: 两个 for 循环用于遍历弧的行和列。对于每个弧，我们通过调用 beginPath() 来开始新路径。在代码中，为清晰起见，圆弧的每个参数都在一个变量中，但是您不一定必须在现实生活中这样做。

trans-unit.source: The underlying data format is defined by the IEEE draft specification draft-ietf-mmusic-sctp-sdp. The current format specifies its protocol as either "UDP/DTLS/SCTP" (UDP carrying DTLS carrying SCTP) or "TCP/DTLS/SCTP" (TCP carrying DTLS carrying SCTP). Older browsers may only specify "DTLS/SCTP".
trans-unit.target: 基础数据格式由IEEE草案规范 draft-ietf-mmusic-sctp-sdp 定义。当前格式将其协议指定为 "UDP/DTLS/SCTP" （UDP携带DTLS携带SCTP）或 "TCP/DTLS/SCTP" （TCP携带DTLS携带SCTP）。较旧的浏览器只能指定 "DTLS/SCTP" 。

trans-unit.source: The unit is milliseconds and should be accurate to 5 µs (microseconds). However, if the browser is unable to provide a time value accurate to 5 microseconds (due, for example, to hardware or software constraints), the browser can represent the value as a time in milliseconds accurate to a millisecond. Also note the section below on reduced time precision controlled by browser preferences to avoid timing attacks and fingerprinting.
trans-unit.target: 单位为毫秒，应精确到5 µs（微秒）。但是，如果浏览器无法提供精确到5微秒的时间值（例如，由于硬件或软件限制），则浏览器可以将值表示为精确到毫秒的时间（以毫秒为单位）。还要注意以下有关由浏览器首选项控制的降低时间精度的部分，以避免计时攻击和指纹。

trans-unit.source: The unit of DOMHighResTimeStamp is milliseconds and should be accurate to 5 µs (microseconds). trans-unit.target: DOMHighResTimeStamp 的单位为毫秒，应精确到5 µs（微秒）。但是，如果浏览器无法提供精确到5 µs的时间值（例如，由于硬件或软件限制），浏览器可以将值表示为精确到毫秒的时间（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The unit of DOMHighResTimeStamp is milliseconds and should be accurate to 5 µs (microseconds). However, If the browser is unable to provide a time value accurate to 5 microseconds (because, for example, due to hardware or software constraints), the browser can represent a the value as a time in milliseconds accurate to a millisecond.

trans-unit.source: The updatePosition() function updates the position of the ball on the canvas (x and y), and also includes if() statements to check whether the ball has gone off the edges of the canvas. If so, it makes the ball wrap around to the opposite edge. It also includes a check whether a requestAnimationFrame() call has previously been made, and if so, calls it again as required, and calls the canvasDraw() function that updates the canvas scene. A tracker is also set up to write out the X and Y values to the screen, for reference.
trans-unit.target: updatePosition（）函数更新球在画布上的位置（ x 和 y ），并且还包含 if() 语句以检查球是否偏离了画布的边缘。如果是这样，它将使球缠绕到相反的边缘。它还包括检查以前是否进行过 requestAnimationFrame() 调用，如果是，则根据需要再次调用它，并调用更新画布场景的 canvasDraw() 函数。还设置了一个跟踪器，以将X和Y值写到屏幕上，以供参考。

trans-unit.source: The upload completed successfully.
trans-unit.target: 上传成功完成。

trans-unit.source: The upload completed; this event does not differentiate between success or failure, and is sent at the very end of the upload process, regardless of the outcome. Prior to this event being sent, one of load, error, abort, or timeout will already have been delivered to indicate why the upload is ending.
trans-unit.target: 上传完成；此事件不会区分成功还是失败，并且无论结果如何，都会在上传过程的最后发送。在发送此事件之前，将已经交付 load ， error ， abort 或 timeout 之一，以指示上传结束的原因。

trans-unit.source: The upload failed due to an error.
trans-unit.target: 由于错误,上传失败。

trans-unit.source: The upload has begun.
trans-unit.target: 上传已经开始。

trans-unit.source: The upload operation was aborted.
trans-unit.target: 上传操作被中止。

trans-unit.source: The upload timed out because an awaited reply did not arrive within the time interval specified by the timeout property on the XMLHttpRequest.
trans-unit.target: 由于等待的答复未在 XMLHttpRequest 的 timeout 属性指定的时间间隔内到达，因此上载超时。

trans-unit.target: 键值范围的上界(可以是任何类型)。

trans-unit.source: The user agent (browser) is in the process of creating the underlying data transport; that is, whatever network level connection is used to link the two peers together is in the process of being set up. This is the state of a new RTCDataChannel after being created by RTCPeerConnection.createDataChannel() (on the peer which started the connection process).
trans-unit.target: 用户代理（浏览器）正在创建基础数据传输。也就是说，无论使用哪种网络级连接将两个对等方链接在一起，都处于建立过程中。这是由 RTCPeerConnection.createDataChannel() 创建之后（在启动连接过程的对等方上）创建的新 RTCDataChannel 的状态。

trans-unit.source: The user agent (browser) or operating system doesn't allow playback of media in the current context or situation. This may happen, for example, if the browser requires the user to explicitly start media playback by clicking a "play" button.
trans-unit.target: 用户代理(浏览器)或操作系统不允许在当前环境或情况下播放媒体。例如,如果浏览器要求用户通过点击 "播放 "按钮明确地开始播放媒体,就可能发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: The user agent blocked registration of the protocol handler. This might happen if an invalid scheme is specified, such as "http", which cannot be registered for obvious security reasons, or if the browser requires that this function be called from a secure context, or that the handler's URL be an HTTPS one.
trans-unit.target: 用户代理阻止了协议处理程序的注册。如果指定了无效的方案,例如 "http",由于明显的安全原因不能注册,或者如果浏览器要求从安全的上下文中调用该函数,或者处理程序的URL是HTTPS的,就可能发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: The user agent can't handle any more SourceBuffer objects, or creating a new SourceBuffer using the given mimeType would result in an unsupported configuration of SourceBuffers.
trans-unit.target: 用户代理无法再处理任何 SourceBuffer 对象，或者使用给定的 mimeType 创建新的 SourceBuffer 会导致 SourceBuffer 的配置不受支持。

trans-unit.source: The user agent determines, using whatever mechanism it chooses, the maximum amount of storage a given site can use. This maximum is the origin's quota. The amount of this space which is in use by the site is called its usage. Both of these values are estimates; there are several reasons why they're not precise:
trans-unit.target: 用户代理使用其选择的任何机制确定给定站点可以使用的最大存储量。此最大值是原点的配额。该站点正在使用的空间量称为其使用量。这两个值都是估计值；它们不精确的原因有几个：

trans-unit.source: The user agent disallowed any speech input from occurring for reasons of security, privacy or user preference.
trans-unit.target: 用户代理出于安全、隐私或用户偏好的原因,不允许发生任何语音输入。

trans-unit.source: The user agent disallowed the requested speech recognition service, either because the user agent doesn't support it or because of reasons of security, privacy or user preference. In this case it would allow another more suitable speech recognition service to be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 用户代理不允许所请求的语音识别服务,要么是因为用户代理不支持该服务,要么是因为安全、隐私或用户偏好的原因。在这种情况下,它将允许使用另一种更合适的语音识别服务。

trans-unit.source: The user agent may implement the process of actually sending data in any way it chooses; this may be done periodically during the event loop or truly asynchronously. As messages are actually sent, this value is reduced accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 用户代理可以以它选择的任何方式实现实际发送数据的过程;这可以在事件循环期间周期性地进行,也可以真正异步地进行。随着消息的实际发送,这个值会相应减少。

trans-unit.source: The user agent should balance audio output latency and power consumption when selecting a latency value.
trans-unit.target: 用户代理在选择延迟值时应平衡音频输出延迟和功耗。

trans-unit.source: The user agent should select a latency that will maximize playback time by minimizing power consumption at the expense of latency. Useful for non-interactive playback, such as playing music.
trans-unit.target: 用户代理应该选择一个延迟,通过以牺牲延迟为代价的最小化功耗来最大化播放时间。对非交互式播放有用,如播放音乐。

trans-unit.source: The user agent string is built on a formal structure which can be decomposed into several pieces of info. Each of these pieces of info comes from other navigator properties which are also settable by the user. Gecko-based browsers comply with the following general structure:
trans-unit.target: 用户代理字符串是建立在一个形式化的结构上的,它可以被分解成若干条信息,每条信息都来自于其他导航仪的属性,这些属性也可以由用户设置。这些信息中的每一个都来自于其他的导航器属性,这些属性也可以由用户设置。基于Gecko的浏览器遵守以下一般结构。

trans-unit.source: The user agent will retain the data as long as possible, clearing all "best-effort" boxes before considering clearing a box marked "persistent". If it becomes necessary to consider clearing persistent boxes, the user agent will notify the user and provide a way to clear one or more persistent boxes as needed.
trans-unit.target: 用户代理将尽可能长时间地保留数据，清除所有 "best-effort" 框，然后再考虑清除标记为 "persistent" 的框。如果有必要考虑清除永久框，则用户代理将通知用户，并根据需要提供一种清除一个或多个永久框的方法。

trans-unit.source: The user agent will try to retain the data contained in the box for as long as it can, but will not warn users if storage space runs low and it becomes necessary to clear the box in order to relieve the storage pressure.
trans-unit.target: 用户代理将尝试尽可能长时间地保留盒子中包含的数据，但是如果存储空间不足，并且将有必要清理盒子以减轻存储压力，则不会警告用户。

trans-unit.source: The user always has the ability to exit fullscreen mode of their own accord; see Things your users want to know. You can also do so programmatically by calling the Document.exitFullscreen() method.
trans-unit.target: 用户始终可以自行退出全屏模式；查看您的用户想知道的事情。您也可以通过调用 Document.exitFullscreen() 方法以编程方式执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: The values returned by getComputedStyle are known as resolved values. These are usually the same as the CSS 2.1 computed values, but for some older properties like width, height or padding, they are instead the used values. Originally, CSS 2.0 defined the computed values to be the "ready to be used" final values of properties after cascading and inheritance, but CSS 2.1 redefined computed values as pre-layout, and used values as post-layout. For CSS 2.0 properties, the getComputedStyle function returns the old meaning of computed values, now called used values. An example of difference between pre- and post-layout values includes the resolution of percentages that represent the width or the height of an element (also known as its layout), as those will be replaced by their pixel equivalent only in the used value case.
trans-unit.target: getComputedStyle 返回的值称为 resolved values 。这些通常与CSS 2.1 computed values ，但是对于某些较旧的属性（例如 width ， height 或 padding )，它们是 used values 。最初，CSS 2.0将计算值定义为级联和继承后的属性的“准备使用”最终值，但是CSS 2.1将计算值重新定义为布局前，而将值用作布局后。对于CSS 2.0属性， getComputedStyle 函数返回计算值的旧含义，现在称为已使用值。布局前和布局后值之间的差异示例包括表示元素宽度或高度的百分比分辨率（也称为元素布局），因为仅在使用值情况下，这些百分比将被其像素等效值替代。

trans-unit.source: The values set with vertexAttribPointer are context-global, i.e. they aren't part of the shader state (like generix vertex attribute indexes to shader variable bindings) and aren't part of the vertex array object state (like enabled vertex attribute arrays). The only way to change the values is by calling this function again.
trans-unit.target: 使用 vertexAttribPointer 设置的值是上下文全局的，即它们不是着色器状态的一部分（如着色器变量绑定的通用顶点属性索引），也不是顶点数组对象状态的一部分（如启用的顶点属性数组）。更改值的唯一方法是再次调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: The vertex shader
trans-unit.target: 顶点着色器

trans-unit.source: The vertex shader can, as needed, also do things like determine the coordinates within the face's texture of the texel to apply to the vertex, apply the normals to determine the lighting factor to apply to the vertex, and so on. This information can then be stored in varyings or attributes as appropriate to be shared with the fragment shader.
trans-unit.target: 顶点着色器还可以根据需要执行诸如确定要应用到顶点的texel的面部纹理内的坐标，应用法线以确定要应用于顶点的照明因子之类的操作。然后，该信息可以被存储在varyings或属性酌情与片段着色器共享。

trans-unit.source: The vertex shader code may include a number of attributes, but we don't need to specify the values for each attribute. Instead, we can supply a default value that will be identical for all vertices. We can call gl.disableVertexAttribArray() to tell WebGL to use the default value, while calling gl.enableVertexAttribArray() will read the values from the array buffer as specified with gl.vertexAttribPointer().
trans-unit.target: 顶点着色器代码可能包含许多属性，但是我们不需要为每个属性指定值。相反，我们可以提供一个对于所有顶点都相同的默认值。我们可以调用 gl.disableVertexAttribArray() 来告诉WebGL的使用默认值，同时呼吁 gl.enableVertexAttribArray() 与指定将从数组缓冲区中读取的值 gl.vertexAttribPointer() 。

trans-unit.source: The vertex shader must perform the needed transforms on the vertex's position, make any other adjustments or calculations it needs to make on a per-vertex basis, then return the transformed vertex by saving it in a special variable provided by GLSL, called gl_Position.
trans-unit.target: 顶点着色器必须对顶点的位置执行所需的转换，在每个顶点的基础上进行任何其他调整或计算，然后将转换后的顶点保存在GLSL提供的特殊变量 gl_Position 中，以将其返回。

trans-unit.source: The web page creates a div element with the ID result , which gets used to display the result, then spawns the worker. trans-unit.source: The webgl spec, based on the OpenGL ES 2.0/3.0 specs points out that the minimum and maximum width for a line is implementation defined. The maximum minimum width is allowed to be 1.0. The minimum maximum width is also allowed to be 1.0. Because of these implementation defined limits it is not recommended to use line widths other than 1.0 since there is no guarantee any user's browser will display any other width.
trans-unit.target: 基于OpenGL ES 2.0/3.0规范的webgl规范指出,线的最小和最大宽度是由实现定义的。最大的最小宽度被允许为1.0。最小最大宽度也被允许为1.0。由于这些实施定义的限制,我们不建议使用1.0以外的线条宽度,因为不能保证任何用户的浏览器会显示任何其他宽度。

It includes the width of the vertical scrollbar if the text direction of the element is right–to–left and if there is an overflow causing a left vertical scrollbar to be rendered. clientLeft does not include the left margin or the left padding. clientLeft is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 元素左边框的宽度，以像素为单位。如果元素的文本方向是从右到左，并且有溢出导致渲染左垂直滚动条，则它包括垂直滚动条的宽度。 clientLeft 不包括左边界或左填充。 clientLeft 是只读的。

trans-unit.source: The width of the offscreen canvas.

trans-unit.source: The window method sizeToContent() is also disabled if the user unchecks the preference Move or resize existing windows checkbox. Moving and resizing a window remotely on the user's screen via script will very often annoy the users, will disorient the user, and will be wrong at best. The web author expects to have full control of (and can decide about) every position and size aspects of the users' browser window ... which is simply not true.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户取消选中首选项“ Move or resize existing windows 复选框，则也将禁用窗口方法sizeToContent（）。通过脚本在用户的屏幕上远程移动和调整窗口大小经常会惹恼用户，使用户迷惑，并且充其量是错误的。网络作者希望完全控制（并可以决定）用户浏览器窗口的每个位置和大小方面……这根本不是事实。

trans-unit.source: The window you create must respect the Same Origin Policy. If the window you open is not in the same orgin as the current window, you will not be able to resize, or access any information on, that window/tab.
trans-unit.target: 您创建的窗口必须遵守 "同一来源策略"。如果您打开的窗口与当前窗口不在同一产地,您将无法调整该窗口/标签的大小或访问其任何信息。

trans-unit.source: The window.blur() method is the programmatic equivalent of the user shifting focus away from the current window.
trans-unit.target: window.blur()方法相当于用户将焦点从当前窗口移开的程序。

trans-unit.source: The words or patterns of words that we want the recognition service to recognize.

trans-unit.source: The worker context is represented by a DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope object in the case of dedicated workers (standard workers that are utilized by a single script; shared workers use SharedWorkerGlobalScope). A dedicated worker is only accessible from the script that first spawned it, whereas shared workers can be accessed from multiple scripts.
trans-unit.target: 在专用工作程序（由单个脚本使用的标准工作程序；共享工作程序使用 SharedWorkerGlobalScope ）的情况下，工作程序上下文由 DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope 对象表示。只能从首先产生专用工作程序的脚本中访问专用工作程序，而可以从多个脚本访问共享工作程序。

trans-unit.source: The worker sets the property onmessage to a function which will receive messages sent when the worker object's postMessage() is called (note that this differs from defining a global variable of that name, or defining a function with that name. var onmessage and function onmessage will define global properties with those names, but they will not register the function to receive messages sent by the web page that created the worker). This starts the recursion, spawning new copies of itself to handle each iteration of the calculation.
trans-unit.target: 工人设置属性 onmessage ，以将接收邮件发送当工人对象的一个函数 postMessage() 被调用（注意，这不同于定义一个全局变量这个名字，或者定义一个函数使用该名称。 var onmessage 和 function onmessage 将使用这些名称定义全局属性，但它们将不会注册该函数以接收由创建工作程序的网页发送的消息）。这将启动递归，并生成自身的新副本以处理计算的每次迭代。

trans-unit.source: The worker thread is killed immediately without an opportunity to complete its operations or clean up after itself.
trans-unit.target: 工作线程在没有机会完成操作或清理自己的情况下,立即被杀死。

trans-unit.source: The worker's code is loaded from the file "worker.js". This code assumes that there's an <input> element represented by first; an event handler for the change event is established so that when the user changes the value of first, a message is posted to the worker to let it know.
trans-unit.target: 工作者的代码从文件 "worker.js" 加载。此代码假定存在一个由 first 表示的 <input> 元素；建立了 change 事件的事件处理程序，以便当用户更改 first 的值时，会向工作人员发布一条消息以告知它。

trans-unit.source: The wrapper establishes a CSS grid with two columns and two rows. The first column (sized automatically based on its content) is used for the sidebar and the second column (which will be used for body content) is sized to be at least the width of the contents of the column and at most all remaining available space.
trans-unit.target: 包装器建立了一个有两列和两行的CSS网格,第一列(根据内容自动调整大小)用于侧栏,第二列(将用于正文内容)的大小至少是该列内容的宽度。第一列(根据内容自动调整大小)用于侧栏,第二列(将用于正文内容)的大小至少为该列内容的宽度,并最大限度地保留所有可用空间。

trans-unit.source: The wrapper's width is fixed at 700px so that it will fit in the available space when presented inline on MDN below.
trans-unit.target: 包装器的宽度固定为700px,这样在MDN上内嵌展示时,就能适应下面的可用空间。

trans-unit.source: The window.isSecureContext read-only property indicates whether a context is capable of using features that require secure contexts.
trans-unit.target: 该 window.isSecureContext 只读属性表示上下文是否能够使用需要功能的安全环境。

trans-unit.source: Thetonechange event is used both to indicate when an individual tone has played and when all tones have finished playing. The event's tone property is a string indicating which tone just finished playing. If all tones have finished playing, tone is an empty string; when that's the case, RTCDTMFSender.toneBuffer is empty.
trans-unit.target: 该 tonechange 事件既用来表示当一个人语气发挥，当所有音播放完毕。事件的 tone 属性是一个字符串，指示刚刚播放完的声音。如果所有音调都已播放完毕，则 tone 为空字符串。在这种情况下， RTCDTMFSender.toneBuffer 为空。

trans-unit.source: TheMouseEvent.buttons read-only property indicates which buttons are pressed on the mouse (or other input device) when the event is triggered.
trans-unit.target: 所述 MouseEvent.buttons 只读属性指示被按压在鼠标（或其他输入设备），当该事件被触发的按钮。

trans-unit.source: The Media Capabilities API allows developers to determine decoding and encoding abilities of the device, exposing information such as whether media is supported and whether playback should be smooth and power efficient, with real time feedback about playback to better enable adaptive streaming, and access to display property information.
trans-unit.target: 所述媒体能力API允许开发人员确定解码和编码装置的能力，暴露的信息，如媒体是否被支持，以及是否播放应该是平滑和功率效率，具有约重放的实时反馈，以便更好地使自适应流，并获得显示属性信息。

trans-unit.source: Their novelty provides a new and unexploited opportunity for enterprising sites to reach potential customers. Has the customer switched tabs to answer an email? Win them back with an expiring offer of free shipping that they can’t ignore!
trans-unit.target: 他们的新颖性为进取的网站提供了一个新的未开发的机会来吸引潜在客户。客户是否已切换选项卡以答复电子邮件？他们将为他们赢得免费送货的有效期，这是他们不能忽视的！

trans-unit.source: Then "transmit" the offer to the receiver by calling receiverPC.setRemoteDescription(). This configures the receiver so that it knows how the caller is configured.
trans-unit.target: 然后，通过调用 receiverPC.setRemoteDescription() 将要约“传输”到接收者。这样可以配置接收方，以便知道如何配置呼叫方。

trans-unit.source: Then addEventListener() is called to begin watching the video element so that we obtain notification when the user presses the play button on the video. In response to the user beginning playback, this code fetches the width and height of the video, halving each (we will be halving the size of the video when we perform the chroma-keying effect), then calls the timerCallback() method to start watching the video and computing the visual effect.
trans-unit.target: 然后调用 addEventListener() 开始观看 video 元素，以便我们在用户按下视频上的播放按钮时获得通知。为响应用户开始播放，此代码获取视频的宽度和高度，将视频的宽度和高度减半（执行色度键控效果时，视频的尺寸减半），然后调用 timerCallback() 方法开始观看视频并计算视觉效果。

trans-unit.source: Then a PaymentDetailsUpdate object is created with its error set to a generic message about address errors and with the reset of the object's values taken from shippingAddressErrors, and, using "...defaultPaymentDetails" as the final entry in the object, the remeainder of the properties' values are taken from defaultPaymentDetails.
trans-unit.target: 然后，创建一个 PaymentDetailsUpdate 对象，将其 error 设置为关于地址错误的通用消息，并重置该对象的值，该值取自 shippingAddressErrors ，并使用“ ...defaultPaymentDetails ”作为该对象的最终条目，作为该对象的补救措施。属性的值取自 defaultPaymentDetails 。

trans-unit.source: Then a new custom waveform is built using AudioContext.createPeriodicWave(). This waveform will be used any time the user selects "Custom" from the waveform picker control.
trans-unit.target: 然后，使用 AudioContext.createPeriodicWave() 构建一个新的自定义波形。每当用户从波形选择器控件中选择“自定义”时，都将使用此波形。

trans-unit.source: Then a second RTCPeerConnection, this one representing the receiving end of the call, is created and stored in receiverPC; its onicecandidate event handler is set up too.
trans-unit.target: 然后第二 RTCPeerConnection ，这表示一个呼叫的接收端，被创建并存储在 receiverPC ; 它的 onicecandidate 事件处理程序也已设置。

trans-unit.source: Then add code to specify the texture to map onto the faces, just before draw:
trans-unit.target: 然后添加代码来指定要映射到面孔上的纹理,就在绘制之前。

trans-unit.source: Then come the event handlers. First, we prevent the dragover event from being handled by the default handler, so that our drop zone can receive the drop:
trans-unit.target: 然后是事件处理程序。首先，我们防止 dragover 事件由默认处理程序处理，以便我们的放置区域可以接收放置：

trans-unit.source: Then factoring out the scaleFactor, we get this:
trans-unit.target: 然后再把scaleFactor系数减去,我们就得到了这个。

trans-unit.source: Then for both the incoming and outgoing <video> elements, we remove their src and srcobject attributes using their removeAttribute() methods. This completes the disassociation of the streams from the video elements.
trans-unit.target: 然后，对于传入和传出的 <video> 元素，我们都使用它们的 removeAttribute() 方法删除它们的 src 和 srcobject 属性。这样就完成了流与视频元素的分离。

trans-unit.source: Then in main() in place of the call to loadTexture() in the previous example, we call initTexture() followed by setupVideo() .
trans-unit.target: 然后，在 main() 代替调用的 loadTexture() 在前面的例子中，我们调用 initTexture () ，然后 setupVideo() 。

trans-unit.source: Then include a click event listener on the <html> element:
trans-unit.target: 然后在 <html> 元素上包含一个click事件监听器：

trans-unit.source: Then it calls the computeFrame() method, which performs the chroma-keying effect on the current video frame.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它调用 computeFrame() 方法，该方法对当前视频帧执行色度键控效果。

trans-unit.source: Then move the last column's 1 up one space.
trans-unit.target: 然后将最后一列的1向上移动一个空格。

trans-unit.source: Then take that offer and set the caller's local description to match by calling callerPC.setLocalDescription().
trans-unit.target: 然后采用该要约，并通过调用 callerPC.setLocalDescription() 来设置呼叫者的本地描述以匹配。

trans-unit.source: Then the answer is "transmitted" to the caller by calling callerPC.setRemoteDescription(). This lets the caller know what the receiver's configuration is.
trans-unit.target: 然后，通过调用 callerPC.setRemoteDescription() 将答案“传输”给呼叫者。这使呼叫者知道接收者的配置是什么。

trans-unit.source: Then the current rotation angle (in degrees) is set to 0.0, since we haven't performed any rotation yet, and the rotation speed (in degrees per screen refresh period, typically 60 FPS) is set to 6.

trans-unit.source: Then we call setTimeout(), passing into it a function which runs the callback passed into our implementation of requestIdleCallback(). The callback is passed an object which conforms to IdleDeadline, with didTimeout set to false and atimeRemaining() method which is implemented to give the callback 50 milliseconds of time to begin with. Each time timeRemaining() is called, it subtracts the elapsed time from the original 50 milliseconds to determine the amount of time left.
trans-unit.target: 然后，我们调用 setTimeout() ，并向其中传递一个函数，该函数运行传递给我们 requestIdleCallback() 实现的回调。回调传递给一个符合 IdleDeadline 的对象，其 didTimeout 设置为 false ,并设置一个 timeRemaining() 方法，该方法实现了给回调以50毫秒的开始时间。每次调用 timeRemaining() 时，它都会从原始的50毫秒中减去经过的时间，以确定剩余的时间量。

trans-unit.target: 然后，我们将要调用的用户名复制到变量 targetUsername 中,并调用 createPeerConnection() ，该函数将创建并执行 RTCPeerConnection 的基本配置。

trans-unit.source: Then we establish the position of the square plane by loading the identity position and translating away from the camera by 6 units. Finally we draw the object by calling the drawArrays() method.
trans-unit.target: 然后，我们通过加载身份位置并平移相机6个单位来确定正方形平面的位置。之后，我们将正方形的顶点缓冲区绑定到着色器用于 aVertexPosition 的属性，然后告诉WebGL如何从中提取数据。最后，我们通过调用 drawArrays() 方法绘制对象。

trans-unit.source: Then we get the type of waveform to use by checking the value of the waveform picker control in the settings bar. If any other waveform type is selected in the wave picker, we simply set the oscillator's type to the value of the picker; that value will be one of sine, square, triangle, and sawtooth.
trans-unit.target: 然后，通过在设置栏中检查波形选择器控件的值来获得要使用的波形类型。如果用户将其设置为 "custom" ，我们将调用 OscillatorNode.setPeriodicWave() 将振荡器配置为使用我们的自定义波形。这样做会自动将振荡器的 type 为 custom 。如果在检波器中选择了任何其他波形类型，我们只需将振荡器的类型设置为检波器的值即可；该值将是 sine ， square ， triangle 和 sawtooth 。

trans-unit.source: Then we iterate over the array of user names using forEach(). Next, we set a handler for the click event on the list item, that clicking on a user name calls our invite() method, which we'll look at in the next section.
trans-unit.target: 然后，我们使用 forEach() 遍历用户名数组。对于每个名称，我们创建一个新的 <li> 元素，然后使用 createTextNode() 创建一个包含用户名的新文本节点。该文本节点被添加为 <li> 元素的子元素。接下来，我们为列表项上的 click 事件设置一个处理程序，单击用户名将调用我们的 invite() 方法，我们将在下一部分中进行介绍。

trans-unit.source: Then we iterate over the items in the list of dropped items. For each one, we call its webkitGetAsEntry() method to obtain a FileSystemEntry representing the file. If that's successful, we call scanFiles() to process the item—either by adding it to the list if it's just a file or by adding it and walking down into it if it's a directory.
trans-unit.target: 然后，我们遍历已删除项目列表中的项目。对于每个文件，我们调用其 webkitGetAsEntry() 方法以获得代表该文件的 FileSystemEntry 。如果成功，我们将调用 scanFiles() 处理该项目-如果只是一个文件，则将其添加到列表中；如果是一个目录，则将其添加并向下浏览。

trans-unit.source: There are a myriad of video and audio codecs. Different browsers support different media types and new media types are always being developed. With the Media Capabilities API, developers can ensure each user is getting the best bitrate and storage savings for their browser, device, and OS capabilities.

trans-unit.source: There are a number of reasons why a timeout may take longer to fire than anticipated. This section describes the most common reasons.
trans-unit.target: 超时可能需要比预期更长的时间来启动,有很多原因。本节介绍最常见的原因。

trans-unit.source: There are a number of small differences between the terminology used in CSS Animations and the terminology used in Web Animations. For instance, Web Animations doesn't use the string "infinite", but instead uses the JavaScript keyword Infinity. And instead of timing-function we use easing. We aren’t listing an easing value here because, unlike CSS Animations where the default animation-timing-function is ease, in the Web Animations API the default easing is linear — which is what we want here.
trans-unit.target: CSS动画中使用的术语与Web动画中使用的术语之间存在许多细微差异。例如，Web Animations不使用字符串 "infinite" ，而是使用JavaScript关键字 Infinity 。而不是使用 timing-function 我们使用 easing 。我们此处未列出 easing 值，因为与CSS动画不同，默认情况下，默认的缓动功能为 ease ，而CSS Animations的默认缓动功能为easy，而在Web Animations API中，默认缓动为 linear -这就是我们想要的。

trans-unit.source: There are a number of tags, such as <bold>, that can be used. However, if the WebVTT file is used in a <track> element where the attribute kind is chapters then you cannot use tags.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用许多标记，例如 <bold> 。但是，如果在属性 kind 为 chapters 的 <track> 元素中使用了WebVTT文件，则不能使用标签。

trans-unit.source: There are a number of web technologies that store data of one kind or another on the client side (i.e. on your local disk). IndexedDB is the most commonly talked about one. The process by which the browser works out how much space to allocate to web data storage and what to delete when that limit is reached is not simple, and differs between browsers. Browser storage limits and eviction criteria attempts to explain how this works, at least in the case of Firefox.
trans-unit.target: 有许多Web技术可以在客户端（即，本地磁盘）上存储一种或另一种数据。IndexedDB是最常谈论的一种。浏览器确定要分配给Web数据存储空间的数量以及达到该限制时要删除的内容的过程并不简单，并且在不同的浏览器中有所不同。浏览器的存储限制和驱逐条件试图解释这种工作方式，至少在Firefox中是如此。

trans-unit.source: There are a number of web technologies that store data of one kind or another on the client-side (i.e., on your local disk). The process by which the browser works out how much space to allocate to web data storage and what to delete when that limit is reached is not simple, and differs between browsers. This article describes how browsers determine what local content to purge and when in order to free up needed local storage space.
trans-unit.target: 有许多网络技术在客户端(即在你的本地磁盘上)存储了这样或那样的数据。浏览器计算出要分配多少空间给网络数据存储,以及当达到该限制时要删除哪些内容的过程并不简单,而且在不同的浏览器之间也有所不同。本文介绍了浏览器如何确定要清除哪些本地内容以及何时清除,以释放所需的本地存储空间。

trans-unit.source: There are four different sounds, or voices, which can be played. Each voice has four buttons, which represent four beats in one bar of music. When they are enabled the note will sound. When the instrument plays, it will move across this set of beats and loop the bar.

trans-unit.source: There are many APIs which provide ways for Web content to store data on a user's computer, including cookies, the Web Storage API (Window.localStorage and Window.sessionStorage), and IndexedDB. The Storage Standard is designed to serve as a common basis for the implementation of all of those APIs and storage technologies, so that their constraints and configurations can be understood and controlled using a common set of methods and properties.
trans-unit.target: 有许多API为Web内容提供了将数据存储在用户计算机上的方式，包括cookie，Web Storage API（ Window.localStorage 和 Window.sessionStorage ）以及IndexedDB。存储标准旨在用作实现所有这些API和存储技术的通用基础，以便可以使用一组通用的方法和属性来理解和控制其约束和配置。

trans-unit.source: There are many reasons why calls may end. A call might have completed, with one or both sides having hung up. Perhaps a network failure has occurred, or one user might have quit their browser, or had a system crash. In any case, all good things must come to an end.
trans-unit.target: 通话结束的原因有很多。通话可能已经结束,其中一方或双方已经挂断。也许发生了网络故障,或者某个用户退出了浏览器,或者系统崩溃。无论如何,所有美好的事物都必须结束。

trans-unit.source: There are many types of matrices, but the ones we are interested in are the 3D transformation matrices. These matrices consist of a set of 16 values arranged in a 4x4 grid. In JavaScript, it is easy to represent a matrix as an array. The typical starting point is to show the identity matrix. When this matrix is multiplied against another point or matrix then the result will be identical.
trans-unit.target: 矩阵的类型有很多,但我们感兴趣的是三维变换矩阵。这些矩阵由一组16个值组成,排列在4x4网格中。在JavaScript中,很容易将矩阵表示为一个数组。典型的起点是显示身份矩阵。当这个矩阵与另一个点或矩阵相乘时,那么结果将是相同的。

trans-unit.source: There are now several Mozilla extensions (like Multizilla) and Firefox extensions (like Tabbrowser preferences), features, settings and advanced preferences based on tab-browsing and based on converting window.open() calls into opening tabs, based on neutralizing window.open() calls, in particular in neutralizing unrequested openings of new windows (often referred as blocking unrequested popups or as blocking script-initiated windows opening automatically). Such features found in extensions include opening a link in a new window or not, in the same window, in a new tab or not, in "background" or not. Coding carelessly to open new windows can no longer be assured of success, can not succeed by force and, if it does, it will annoy a majority of users.
trans-unit.target: 现在有几种Mozilla扩展（如Multizilla）和Firefox扩展（如Tabbrowser首选项），功能，设置和基于首选项卡浏览以及基于将window.open（）调用转换为基于中和window.open的打开选项卡的高级首选项。 （）调用，尤其是在取消新窗口的未请求打开（通常称为阻止未请求的弹出窗口或阻止脚本启动的窗口自动打开）中。在扩展程序中发现的此类功能包括是否在新窗口中，在同一窗口中，是否在新选项卡中，是否在“背景”中打开链接。漫不经心地编码以打开新窗口无法再保证成功，不能用武力成功，而且如果这样做，它将使大多数用户感到烦恼。

trans-unit.source: There are other techniques used to ensure that data is submitted. One such technique is to delay the unload to submit data by creating an Image element and setting its src attribute within the unload handler. As most user agents will delay the unload to complete the pending image load, data can be submitted during the unload. Another technique is to create a no-op loop for several seconds within the unload handler to delay the unload and submit data to a server.
trans-unit.target: 还有其他技术可用于确保提交数据。一种这样的技术是通过创建Image元素并在卸载处理程序中设置其 src 属性来延迟卸载以提交数据。由于大多数用户代理将延迟卸载以完成挂起的映像加载，因此可以在卸载期间提交数据。另一种技术是在卸载处理程序中几秒钟内创建一个无操作循环，以延迟卸载并将数据提交到服务器。

trans-unit.source: There are other workaround techniques which have been used to ensure that this kind of data is submitted. One such technique is to delay the unload in order to submit data by creating an <img> element and setting its src attribute within the unload handler. As most user agents will delay the unload to complete the pending image load, data can be submitted during the unload. Another technique is to create a no-op loop for several seconds within the unload handler to delay the unload and submit data to a server.
trans-unit.target: 还有其他变通办法技术已用于确保提交此类数据。一种这样的技术是通过创建 <img> 元素并在卸载处理程序中设置其 src 属性来延迟卸载以便提交数据。由于大多数用户代理将延迟卸载以完成挂起的映像加载，因此可以在卸载期间提交数据。另一种技术是在卸载处理程序中几秒钟内创建一个无操作循环，以延迟卸载并将数据提交到服务器。

trans-unit.source: There are several properties you can look at in order to determine the width and height of elements, and it can be tricky to determine which is the right one for your needs. This article is designed to help you make that decision. Note that all these properties are read-only. If you want to set the width and height of an element, use width and height or the overriding min-width and max-width, and min-height and max-height properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以查看几个属性来确定元素的宽度和高度，而要确定哪种属性最适合您可能很棘手。本文旨在帮助您做出此决定。请注意，所有这些属性都是只读的。如果要设置元素的宽度和高度，请使用 width 和 height 或覆盖的 min-width 和 max-width 以及 min-height 和 max-height 属性。

trans-unit.target: 有几种版本的 disconnect() 方法，它们接受参数的不同组合以控制要从中断开连接的节点。如果未提供任何参数，则将断开所有传出连接。

trans-unit.source: There are several ways in which you can indicate to the user that a drop is allowed at a certain location. The mouse pointer will update as necessary depending on the value of the dropEffect property. Although the exact appearance depends on the user's platform, typically a plus sign icon will appear for a 'copy' for example, and a 'cannot drop here' icon will appear when a drop is not allowed. This mouse pointer feedback is sufficient in many cases.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过多种方式向用户指示在特定位置允许放置。鼠标指针将根据 dropEffect 属性的值根据需要进行更新。尽管确切的外观取决于用户的平台，但是例如，对于“副本”，通常会出现加号图标，而在不允许放置时，会出现“不能在此处放置”图标。在许多情况下，此鼠标指针反馈就足够了。

trans-unit.source: There are several ways this code can be made better. Most real games would watch for keydown events, start motion when that happens, and stop the motion when the corresponding keyup occurs, instead of relying on key repeats. That would allow both smoother and faster movement, but would also allow the player to be moving and steering at the same time. Transitions or animations could be used to make the ship's movement smoother, too.
trans-unit.target: 有几种方法可以使此代码变得更好。最真实的游戏会留意 keydown 事件，这种情况发生的时候开始运动，并在相应的停止运动 keyup 发生，而不是依赖于关键重复。这样既可以使动作更平稳更快，又可以让玩家同时运动和转向。过渡或动画也可以用来使船的运动更平滑。

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to handle screen orientation, both with CSS and JavaScript. The first is the orientation media query. This lets content adjust its layout using CSS, based on whether the browser window is in landscape mode (that is, its width is greater than its height) or portrait mode (its height is greater than its width).
trans-unit.target: CSS和JavaScript都有几种处理屏幕方向的方法。首先是定向媒体查询。这样，内容就可以根据浏览器窗口是处于横向模式（即宽度大于其高度）还是纵向模式（其高度大于其宽度）使用CSS来调整其布局。

trans-unit.source: There are some cases in which the synchronous usage of XMLHttpRequest was not replaceable, like during the window.onunload and window.onbeforeunload events. You should consider using the fetch API with keepalive flag. When fetch with keepalive isn't available, you can consider using the navigator.sendBeacon API can support these use cases typically while delivering a good UX.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，XMLHttpRequest的同步用法不可替代，例如在 window.onunload 和 window.onbeforeunload 事件期间。您应该考虑使用带有 keepalive 标志的 fetch API 。当 fetch 与 keepalive 不可用，则可以考虑使用navigator.sendBeacon API通常可以支持这些使用情况，同时提供了良好的UX。

trans-unit.source: There are two types of PromiseRejectionEvent: unhandledrejection is sent by the JavaScript runtime when a promise is rejected but the rejection goes unhandled. trans-unit.source: There's a good reason why the notion of tracking visibility of ads is being used in this example. It turns out that one of the most common uses of Flash or other script in advertising on the Web is to record how long each ad is visible, for the purpose of billing and payment of revenues. Without the Intersection Observer API, this winds up being done using intervals and timeouts for each individual ad, or other techniques that tend to slow the page down. Using this API lets everything get streamlined by the browser to reduce the impact on performance substantially.
trans-unit.target: 在这个例子中使用跟踪广告可见度的概念是有原因的。原来,Flash或其他脚本在网络广告中最常见的用途之一是记录每个广告的可见性时间,以达到计费和支付收入的目的。如果没有Intersection Observer API,就会通过对每个广告的间隔和超时,或者其他会拖慢页面速度的技术来完成。使用这个API可以让一切都被浏览器简化,以大幅降低对性能的影响。

trans-unit.source: These cookie blocking policies are known to break embedded cross-origin content that requires access to its first-party storage. As an example, federated logins often require access to authentication cookies stored in first-party storage, and will require the user to sign in on each site separately (or completely break) if those cookies are not available. In the case of breakage, site owners have often encouraged users to add their site as an exception or to disable the policy entirely. As a consequence, users who wish to continue to interact with embedded content are forced to greatly relax their blocking policy for resources loaded from all embedded origins and possibly across all websites.
trans-unit.target: 众所周知,这些cookie阻止政策会破坏需要访问其第一方存储的嵌入式跨源内容。举个例子,联合登录通常需要访问存储在第一方存储中的验证cookie,如果这些cookie不可用,则会要求用户分别在每个网站上登录(或完全中断)。在破损的情况下,网站所有者往往鼓励用户将自己的网站添加为例外,或者完全禁用该策略。因此,希望继续与嵌入式内容互动的用户不得不大大放松对所有嵌入式起源加载的资源的屏蔽政策,而且可能是跨所有网站。
